original_text: Put the Lord's Covenant Box on the cart. Put another box on the cart with the gold images inside it. Those are your offerings to their God so that he will forgive you. Then send the cart away.
korean_text: 여호와의 궤를 가져다가 수레에 싣고 속건제로 드릴 금으로 만든 물건들은 상자에 담아 궤 곁에 두고 그것을 보내어 가게 하고

sentences.original_text: Put the Lord's Covenant Box on the cart.
Put another box on the cart
with the gold images inside it.
Those are your offerings to their God
sentences.korean_translation: 그것들이 그들의 하나님께 드리는 너희의 예물이며,

sentences.original_text: so that he will forgive you.
